name: Nuts & Bucks
description:
Nuts & Bucks is a local 1v1 Arcade Game playable on PC.

Each player controls a squirrel and your task is to collect coins from the pile of gold in the center of the arena. The richest player wins at the end of the game.

Dash, collect, catch your opponent and steal its coins. You have to be the quickest to bank money in your house !

Enjoy this fun little game with a friend and become the richest squirrel !
